title: Retrieve UK Savings Account Annual Summary Response
description: Retrieve UK Savings Account Annual Summary Response

taxedUkInterest.description: Total net taxed interest for the specified savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

untaxedUkInterest.description: Total untaxed interest for the specified savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative URL of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The ‘rel’ will be ‘self’ where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
